articles.description: India vs Australia: The first ODI of the three-match series will be played on Friday at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai. Here is what we think could be India's playing XI for the game -
articles.content: After clinching the four-match Test series of the Border-Gavaskar Trophy against Australia 2-1, Team India is all set to face the same opponents again in a three-match ODI series. The first match of … [+3835 chars]
